definition: to revolve/to turn/to circle about/to walk about/classifier for revolutions (per minute etc): revs, rpm/classifier for repeated actions
to turn/to change direction/to transfer/to forward (mail)
muscle/tendon/veins visible under the skin/sth resembling tendons or veins (e.g. fiber in a vegetable)

sentences.english: Have you ever put your tongue on cold metal so that it got stuck?
sentences.chinese: 你有沒有把舌頭放在冷金屬上導致它轉筋？
